::Battera::
"Pretending? I am not pretending. I am working for the Allience under 
Zardus now. And untill we win the war, Cybershark and I will continue 
to fight."  She stoppped and looked at him wide eyed. "CYbertron? 
Your going to Cybertron? How? With whom? When?" She sudenly realized 
that she might be able to go home and get off this planet. Maybe even 
take Cybershark with her. She smiled at the thought.

::Spears::

She took Prebons's arm and walked out with him.  She felt uneasy 
abuot all this.  She wondered if Slayer would "Accidentally" line her 
up in his sights and killer when attacking Ramulus.  She knew she 
would have to stick very close to Prebon in order to be safe.






--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> (Soundwave is alive? How did this happen?)
> 
> Vulois laughed.
> 
> "Stop pretending Battera. I know it's been awhile since we saw each 
> other face to face, but you don't have to rub it in. I just came to 
> say I'm leaving. I'm going to Cybertron. I'm passing the mission 
down 
> to The Keepers. If you want, they will comfort you with open arms. 
> But you don't have to. You are free Battera. You can do what you 
want 
> now. You can settle down with Cybershark without worries. I just 
came 
> to say good-bye." Vulois saw the new femme walk up. "Who's your new 
> friend?"
> 
______________________________________________________________________
> Brix/Fliq
> 
> Brix and Fliq rejoiced at the sound of battle.
> 
> "We're in Ramulus. Behind you 100%."
> 
______________________________________________________________________
> Trainers
> 
> Prebon whispered to Spears.
> 
> 
> ***I don't trust him either. If it wasn't for the loyalty in his 
> programming I would think he'd kill me the first chance he gets. 
But 
> he won't turn on us unlesss he starts suspecting his past. And if 
he 
> does that, we'll chip him. So just try not to get into anything 
with 
> him.***
> 
> Prebon turned to the rest of the group.
> 
> "Savage and Trainers, go around the long way to the right so people 
> won't see us marching with you. And when you get close to the area, 
> turn on your cloaking devices." The Trainers aboard Savage started 
> down their path, "Slayer, take the long way to the left. That's 
where 
> the cliff is. Remember to turn on your cloak when you get up the 
> ridge. Spears and I will go directly to the spot. When we get close 
> Spears make it look like you are fighting me. It has to be 
realistic. 
> Hopefully we'll get a map out of all this too. Now move out!"
> 
> Prebon started walking.
